channel.title: Miscellaneous on Erik Ace
channel.description: Recent content in Miscellaneous on Erik Ace

item.title: The Politics of Spectacle
item.description: Living through the Barack Obama, and the Bernie Sanders campaigns of 2008 and 2016, respectively, have given me a strange sense of what politics are like. Now, I’m only twenty eight years old and my experience is skewed due to that, however, it feels as though those two years were particularly focused on policies that made elections feel worth something. During the 2020 campaign, Donald Trump’s campaign was mostly focused on continuing to build the wall, villainize China, and to manage (not sure this is the right word) the coronovirus 19 pandemic.
